ol.li: The purpose of this procedure is to ensure the protection of employees from respiratory hazards, through proper use of respirators. In addition, this procedure was developed to control those occupational diseases caused by breathing air contaminated with harmful particulates, fogs, fumes, mists, gases, smokes, sprays, or vapors.

The primary objective of all Space locations is to prevent atmospheric releases, as far as feasible, through accepted control measures. When effective controls are not feasible, or while they are being established, appropriate respirators are to be used as detailed in this procedure.
